name: Komperdell Carbon CXP Powerlock Poles - Women's
description: Built for the trail. These adjustable poles have a nice, light swing-weight with added durability. The best of both worlds.3-section design with carbon fibre uppers and an extra-durable aluminum lower section.Women's specific features: smaller grip and shorter pole length.Powerlock 3.0 for secure adjustments.Ultralight foam grips.Padded wrist straps.Includes trekking baskets.Durable carbide tips.
